name: Dubai Safari Offroad 4x4
description:
Let’s drive 4x4 off road jeep in the deadly desert of Dubai. Dubai desart jeep riding having a unique kind of adventure, which is not any other offroad games

You may have played many off road jeep driving games but play this new free jeep simulator with amazing sandstorm. This jeep car game provides you with addictive dabai music which boost up experience of rally racing game in offroad suv. Enjoy Dubai Safari Offroad 4x4


Dubai Safari Offroad 4x4 Features:
- Legendary Off Road and dasert Jeep riding.
- Iconic rally 4x4 Jeep & luxury Prado.
- Three types of controls, steering, tilt and buttons.
- Drift your jeep in Dubai game desert.
- Best riding and driving experience.
- Optimized premium Quality Graphics.
